man:meta.binding: Green cover, leather spine and corners
man:meta.summary: Notebook containing journal beginning 21 July, Ischl; additional items relating to 2nd edition of Salmonia, written in Southern Austria; notes of journey to Rome "where I arrived Nov 19th 1828. Inside cover note on bread; note written with left hand, 23 July 1828
man:meta.title: RI MS HD/14/M
